name: SHEEP!
description:
A turn based sheep strategy game.

This was an entry into the 59th Week of the Weekly Game Jam.

The theme was 'Pacificst' and what could be more pacifist than saving cute little lambs from big sweaty butchers and snarling wolves? Exactly... nothing.

Have a go at this short and basic turn based game, getting your sheep to the safety of their paddock before getting butchered off!

Collaborated by:

Programmer: VoxGames

Artist: SomeFarang

Musician + SFX: GerryTheMusicMan
